Question
========

One researcher examined the frequencies of hair color in a group of southern and northern rabbits.

|area|Color| |-|-|-| |Light|Dark| |North|471|148|. |South|151|230|

We define the events: A: The northern rabbits with the light color, B: The southern rabbits with the dark color What then is the relative frequency of the northern rabbits with the light color?

Solution
========

The correct answer is 0.
